folder: Arthur Kill Road & Bloomingdale Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Bloomingdale Road
text:
2740 Arthur K;ll Road, south side, between Bloomingdale Road and Chemical Lane. This house is located on the Dixon estate (1917 to 1898). It was earlier (1874) the G. Van Schoyck house. N. L. Sperr states that it 1s the P. Hansen residence. The dates refer to maps upon which the owners' names appear.
May 30, 1932
P. L. Sperr

folder: Arthur Kill Road & Bloomingdale Road, Staten Island, NY

text:
Aruhur Kill Road, at Bloomingdale Road.

May 30, 1932

P.L. Sperr
